segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool is really stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite surprising how far he's leaning without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad because they might get into trouble if the woman notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is creating such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman doesn't feel the water on her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so calm and nice, it contrasts with the inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being clever but also very risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's focus on the cookies is amazing, he doesn't seem to care about anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they enjoy their cookies without any accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
